title: Ben Wallace – 2020 Comments on Army Helping with Testing in Schools
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 29 December 2020.
content:
The UK Armed Forces are stepping up once again this holiday. This week I have authorised over a thousand Armed Forces personnel to assist schools returning after the Christmas break.
